snippet: Secretary of State John Kerry warned North Korea not to test-fire its Musudan missile and said the nation would lose if a conflict broke out.
abstract: Secretary of State John Kerry warns North Korea not to test-fire its Musudan missile and says nation will lose if conflict breaks out; also stresses the United States is open to negotiations with North Korea if it commits itself to eventual denuclearization.

byline.original: By MICHAEL R. GORDON and CHOE SANG-HUN

lead_paragraph: Secretary of State John Kerry warned North Korea not to test-fire its Musudan missile and said the nation would lose if a conflict broke out.

headline.seo: In Seoul, Kerry Warns North Korea Against Missile Test
headline.main: In Seoul, Kerry Warns North Korea Against Missile Test
headline.print_headline: Kerry Warns North Korea Against New Missile Test

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
